# cranalytics

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

cranalytics is an R package analytics tool that tracks and reports R package downloads from the [RStudio CRAN mirror](http://cran-logs.rstudio.com/).

## Installation

You can install the development version of cranalytics from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("mccarthy-m-g/cranalytics")
```
